passive.name: Refraction of Sightline
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> and increases Outgoing Healing by an amount that is equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Effect RES. Outgoing Healing can be increased this way by up to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color>.
